OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive gemcitabine IV 30-60 minute day 1 , 4 , 8 , 11 , 15 , 18 , 22 , 25 , 29 , 32 undergo radiotherapy day 1-5 , 8-12 , 15-19 , 22-26 , 29-33 , 36-38 absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Beginning least 4 week chemoradiotherapy , patient without disease progression le 10 % weight loss study receive additional gemcitabine IV 30 minute day 1 , 8 , 15 . Treatment repeat every 28 day total 2 course . Patients follow every 8 week 6 month every 3 month 2 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 72 patient accrue study within 2.2 3.4 year .
